org.jooby

Class AsyncMapper

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jooby.AsyncMapper
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Route.Mapper

    public class AsyncMapper
extends Object
implements Route.Mapper

    async-mapper

    Map Callable and CompletableFuture results to Deferred API.

    usage

    Script route: 
    
 {
   map(new AsyncMapper());

   get("/callable", () -> {
     return new Callable<String> () {
       public String call() {
         return "OK";
       }
     };
   });

   get("/completable-future", () -> {
     return CompletableFuture.supplyAsync(() -> "OK");
   });
 }
    From Mvc route you can return a callable: 
    

  public class Controller {
    &#64;GET
    &#64;Path("/async")
    public Callable<String> async() {
      return "Success";
    }
  }
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    edgar
